A group of college students established a web solutions startup. Worked on an e-commerce project.
Developed a PHP, MySQL web application. Added a layer on top of Google maps for places and events.

• Involved in designing, developing features and parts of an App Distribution platform.
  • Majorly my work involves:
    • – Designing, writing and consuming HTTP-REST APIs.
    • – Setting up job queues for multiple monitoring tasks.
    • – Writing template code for full-stack Web and Desktop applications.
    • – Automating and setting up application build processes.
    • – Extensive research and POC creation of features,solutions for novel business requirements.
    • – Identifying bottlenecks across system and optimize database queries, page load time, serving time, build time.
  • Developed node-js, python back-end applications for automating and monitoring application build processes.
  • Developed node-js module for restructuring and renaming directory tree, handled resolution of interlinked file-paths in files.
  • Developed macOs desktop application(A Safari App Extension) using Swift for search monetization with app installer and app auto update feature from scratch
• Working on Multiagent systems and path planning.

projects.projectTitle: SONATA: A tool to generate social navigation dataset
projects.shortInfo: A toolkit to generate HRI dataset.

I am working on the credit assignment problem in reinforcement learning in multiagent systems. The aim is to determine which actions taken by agents in a large group of cooperating agents helped the group achieve its goal and hence learn more rapidly.

The proposed planner could be applied to any type of robot and control policy and will consider the most effective path by factoring in the terrain type, power consumption, and time required to reach the goal.
Autonomous Navigation of a Mars Rover in a partially known terrain  with a custom variant of RRT.

projects.projectTitle: Speech Classification using Spiking Neural Networks
projects.shortInfo: Develop an inexpensie devise to classify speech without internet connectivity.

projects.projectTitle: SNGNN-RL: Graph based Reinforcement Learning approach for navigating a robot in a social setting.
projects.shortInfo: Navigate a robot in social environment without disturbing social interactions.
A study of categorization strategy used by adult humans.

summary: I have always been fascinated by the idea of bringing an otherwise inanimate and unintelligent system to life by adding an electronic brain. If machines could be endowed with humans’ ability to adapt and learn quickly, the resultant products can be used to perform any activity by using human-like intelligence but circumventing their low physical and mental resilience. To learn to program such intelligent robots, I did my Bachelors in Computer Science at BITS Pilani (Goa). At the university, with guidance from my professors and seniors, I explored how mimicking human modes of learning on robotic platforms can help researchers better understand cognitive systems and work towards developing truly intelligent machines. Intrigued by the advancements in human-inspired robotics, I have focused most of my studies on Artificial Intelligence and Cognitive Neuroscience.
qoutes: Instead of trying to produce a programme to simulate the adult mind, why not rather try to produce one which simulates the child's? If this when subjected to an apprpriate course of education one would obtain the adult brain.
What we want is a machine that can learn from experience.
helloText:
Dear Visitor, Thank you for visiting my webspace.

I'm a research intern at Biorobotics Lab, CMU and a research collaborator Robocomp, UK

I completed B.E in Computer Science and Information Systems at BITS Pilani, Goa

I'm interested in the applications of Machine Learning in Robotics.

Do we have something in common? If yes, let's have a talk about it and grow together.

We don't have anything in common?
That's fine,please introduce me something that I'm missing.
